head.title: Home - Charter Schools USACharter Schools USA | Putting Students First

meta.name: description
meta.content: Charter Schools USA is an education management company dedicated to putting students first. We represent 57,800+ students and employ over 7,000 educators.
Charter Schools USA is an education management company dedicated to putting students first. We represent 57,800+ students and employ over 7,000 educators.

div.div: Charter Schools USA (CSUSA) creates and operates high quality schools with an unwavering dedication to student achievement and an unyielding commitment to ethical and sound business practices.
